message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good deal.
Alice, my turn. I understand you want a good deal, but my offer in this round gets us both closer to a more balanced outcome.
Bob, time is running out for both of us. This is my final offer. Let's close the deal and avoid losing even more.
Alice, this is my final offer. We both lose if this goes on any longer, and I believe this is a fair split considering the time pressure.
